data.text: @mentorshubam Hi! We are unable to trace your details through the mobile number provided by you. Request you to please provide the registered mobile number and CRN so that we can check and assist you. ^Team Kotak
@mentorshubam Hi Shubham, please write to us at kli.grievance@kotak.com and we shall look into the same. Thanks, Customer Care
@Kotak_Life Us agent ke karan mera time and mere paise dono gaye
@Kotak_Life Kai bar contact karne ki kosis ki lkin 1 bhi bar call nai laga aur paise bhi lage call ke 30 rs 5 mnt me
@mentorshubam Hi Shubham, we regret to hear that you went through an unpleasant experience. Please write to us at kli.grievance@kotak.com and we shall look into the same. Thanks, Customer Care
@mentorshubam Hi Shubham, we regret to hear that you went through an unpleasant experience. Please write to us at kli.grievance@kotak.com and we shall look into the same. Thanks, Customer Care
@udaykotak Jisne fraud kiya wo apki hi agent h kyo ki usi ne activate kiya policy uska naam prerna aur uska number +91 8461-084963
@udaykotak Aur 1 bar bhi customer care me call nai laga bht pareshan hu inki banking service se
